## Title
Format your PR title as `type: brief description`.  
*Example: `feat: add user profile editing`*

**Types:**
- **feat**: New feature
- **fix**: Bug fix
- **perf**: Performance improvement
- **refactor**: Code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
- **docs**: Documentation only
- **style**: Formatting, missing semi-colons, etc
- **test**: Adding or correcting tests
- **chore**: Maintenance, e.g. CI/CD, dependency management, config, etc


## Description
Describe what changes were made and what problems were solved (if any).
*Example:*
- *User can add profile pictures*
- *User can edit and remove profile picture*
- *Fixed broken name field validation*

## Checklist:
- [ ] Tested the new lines written
- [ ] Linted and formatted according to style guide
- [ ] Comments on hard-to-understand areas

> [!NOTE]
> Don't have to strictly follow these instructions, delete sections you deem unnecessary
